detailsData.title: Personalized Service
detailsData.content: What separates us from other personal injury law firms in PA is our personalized service. We know the life-altering impact a traumatic injury can have on you and your family. This is why we fight so hard for you.

detailsData.title: Experienced Attorneys
detailsData.content: Our personal injury attorneys fight relentlessly to obtain just compensation for clients who were injured through no fault of their own. We demand compensation for your pain and suffering, medical bills, lost wages, future expenses, and future income loss.

detailsData.title: Reputation for Success
detailsData.content: Personal injury lawyer Brent Wieand is the founder of the Wieand Law Firm. He is committed to providing compassionate and affordable representation to people throughout Pennsylvania and New Jersey.

detailsData.title: Free Legal Consultation
detailsData.content: Unsure about your rights? Contact our personal injury law firm for a no-risk, no obligation legal consultation. We represent injured clients on a contingency fee basis, meaning we don’t charge a fee unless we recover money for you.

valueProp: The Wieand Law Firm represents people who were seriously injured by someone else’s negligence. Our Philadelphia personal injury lawyers handle a wide range of personal injury matters, including car accidents, medical malpractice, nursing home abuse and slip and fall accidents. You can trust our experienced legal team to provide the advice, guidance and skilled representation needed to recover full compensation for your losses.

testimonalData.text: I turned to Brent after another firm rejected my case. He didn’t stop pushing until the other driver’s auto insurance offered its policy limits.
testimonalData.author: Brandon Kelley

testimonalData.text: I could not be happier with the outcome of my case.
testimonalData.author: Sabrina Algoo

testimonalData.text: He not only handled the "business" aspect of this but was personally very understanding, informative and eased my stress and frustration over this incident.
testimonalData.author: Linda Daugherty
